guide.introduction: This tutorial is for someone with basic lampworking skills and glass knowledge.

guide.summary: How to make a glass flower pendant using lampwork technique, borosilicate glass, oxygen/propane torch.
guide.title: Lampwork Glass Flower Pendant Tutorial
